entreprises 0.1.0

  • Reference

Get company

get_company.Rd

Get company

get_company(siret,
  endpoint = "https://entreprise.data.gouv.fr/api/sirene/v1")

Arguments

siret

a valid siret number
endpoint

API endpoint

Value

a list

Examples


get_company(siret = "38235772100028")
#> $id
#> [1] 144731711
#> 
#> $siren
#> [1] "382357721"
#>
